data.text2:
As part of the Bio-1 Bravo team, you enter the hot zone running the TVA-1000B with both the PID and FID.

As you approach the package, the PID output shows 2-4ppm, while the FID output shows 4-8ppm.
data.text3:
Bio-1 Bravo enters the hot zone running the TVA-1000B with both the PID and FID.

As they approach the package, the PID output shows 2-4ppm, while the FID output shows 4-8ppm.
data.text4: Identify the various types of root cause analysis tools.
data.text5: Analyze a problem using root cause analysis tools.
